Sentence.value: Your health care provider may use this test to help diagnose pernicious anemia.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Your [[health care provider|C0018724]] may use this test to help diagnose [[pernicious anemia|C0002892]].

Sentence.value: This may be due to: - Atrophic gastritis (inflammation of the stomach lining) - Diabetes - Gastric ulcer - Pernicious anemia - Thyroid disease
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: This may be due to: - [[Atrophic gastritis|C0017154]] ([[inflammation|C0021368]] of the stomach lining) - Diabetes - Gastric ulcer - Pernicious anemia - Thyroid disease
